representation_information.name: Formal name: ISO/IEC 14496-3:2001. Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects -- Part 3: Audio. (This part of the MPEG-4 standard specifies several types of audio coding including various Advanced Audio Coding objects.) Common name: AAC-LC.
representation_information.description: A specific type of AAC audio compression widely adopted for use as the audio stream on small mobile devices.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
